languages.text: За удалением маяка с установочной платформы ничего не следует. Огромные стенающие покрывала мутантов продолжают лежать на своих местах — не взрываясь и не сгорая в пламени. Мастер вокса сообщает, что призма из лаборатории гемункула, в последний раз установив связь с маяком, распалась на множество игл. Со звонким щелчком она разлетелась во все стороны, серьезно ранив нескольких членов экипажа.

traits.locale_text: За удалением маяка с установочной платформы не происходит ничего. Огромные стенающие покрывала мутантов продолжают лежать на своих местах — не взрываясь и не сгорая в пламени. Мастер вокса сообщает, что призма из лаборатории гемункула, в последний раз установив связь с маяком, распалась на множество игл и разлетелась во все стороны, серьезно ранив нескольких членов экипажа.

languages.text: The removal of the beacon from the platform proceeds as planned. Nothing happens afterward. The gigantic groaning carpet of mutants continues lying where they were — neither exploding nor burning up. The Vox Master reports that the prism from the Haemonculus's laboratory shattered into a myriad of needles. It flew apart in every direction with a loud snap, gravely wounding several crew members.
languages.original_text: За удалением маяка с установочной платформы ничего не следует. Огромные стенающие покрывала мутантов продолжают лежать на своих местах — не взрываясь и не сгорая в пламени. Мастер вокса сообщает, что призма из лаборатории гемункула, в последний раз установив связь с маяком, распалась на множество игл. Со звонким щелчком она разлетелась во все стороны, серьезно ранив нескольких членов экипажа.

traits.locale_text: The removal of the beacon from the platform it's set up on proceeds as planned. Nothing happens afterwards. The gigantic groaning carpet of mutants continues lying where they were — neither exploding nor burning up. The Vox Master reports that the prism from the Haemonculus's laboratory shattered into a myriad of needles. It flew apart in every direction with a loud snap, gravely wounding several crewmembers.

The Vox Master reports that the prism from the Haemonculus's laboratory shattered into a myriad of needles. It flew apart in every direction with a loud snap, gravely wounding several crewmembers.

The Vox Master reports that the prism from the Haemonculus's laboratory shattered into a myriad of needles. It flew apart in every direction with a loud snap, gravely wounding several crew members.

The removal of the beacon from the platform proceeds as planned. Nothing happens afterward. The gigantic groaning carpet of mutants continues lying where they were — neither exploding nor burning up. The Vox Master reports that the prism from the Haemonculus's laboratory shattered into a myriad of needles. It flew apart in every direction with a loud snap, gravely wounding several crew members.

languages.text: 士兵们顺利地从平台上拆除了信标。信标拆除之后，没有发生任何事情。那只巨大的变种人依旧呻吟着躺在原地，既没有爆炸，也没有燃烧。但音阵大师报告说，船上的血伶人棱镜突然“啪”的一声，碎成了无数锐片，向四面八方飞溅，几名船员因此受了重伤。
languages.original_text: The removal of the beacon from the platform proceeds as planned. Nothing happens afterward. The gigantic groaning carpet of mutants continues lying where they were — neither exploding nor burning up. The Vox Master reports that the prism from the Haemonculus's laboratory shattered into a myriad of needles. It flew apart in every direction with a loud snap, gravely wounding several crew members.

traits.locale_text: 士兵们顺利地从平台上拆除了信标。信标拆除之后，没有发生任何事情。那只巨大的变种人依旧呻吟着躺在原地，既没有爆炸，也没有燃烧。但音阵大师报告说，船上的血伶人棱镜突然“啪”的一声，碎成了无数锐片，向四面八方飞溅，几名船员因此受了重伤。

languages.text: プラットフォームからのビーコン撤去は予定通り行われたが、何事も起きなかった。巨大なうめき声を上げる変異体の絨毯は、爆発も炎上もせず、そのまま横たわり続けている。ヴォクス・マスターの報告によると、ハモンキュラスの研究室のプリズムは無数の針に砕け散ったとのことだ。それは大きな音を立てて四方八方に飛び散り、数名のクルーに重傷を負わせた。
languages.original_text: The removal of the beacon from the platform proceeds as planned. Nothing happens afterward. The gigantic groaning carpet of mutants continues lying where they were — neither exploding nor burning up. The Vox Master reports that the prism from the Haemonculus's laboratory shattered into a myriad of needles. It flew apart in every direction with a loud snap, gravely wounding several crew members.

traits.locale_text: プラットフォームからのビーコン撤去は予定通り行われたが、何事も起きなかった。巨大なうめき声を上げる変異体の絨毯は、爆発も炎上もせず、そのまま横たわり続けている。ヴォクス・マスターの報告によると、ハモンキュラスの研究室のプリズムは無数の針に砕け散ったとのことだ。それは大きな音を立てて四方八方に飛び散り、数名のクルーに重傷を負わせた。

languages.text: La retirada de la baliza de la plataforma se realiza según lo previsto. Después no ocurre nada. La gigantesca alfombra putrefacta de mutantes sigue donde estaba, sin explotar ni arder. La maestra de vocos informa de que el prisma del laboratorio del Hemónculo se fragmentó en una infinidad de agujas. Salió volando en todas direcciones con un fuerte chasquido, hiriendo gravemente a varios miembros de la tripulación.
languages.original_text: The removal of the beacon from the platform proceeds as planned. Nothing happens afterward. The gigantic groaning carpet of mutants continues lying where they were — neither exploding nor burning up. The Vox Master reports that the prism from the Haemonculus's laboratory shattered into a myriad of needles. It flew apart in every direction with a loud snap, gravely wounding several crew members.

traits.locale_text: La retirada de la baliza de la plataforma se realiza según lo previsto. Después no ocurre nada. La gigantesca alfombra putrefacta de mutantes sigue donde estaba, sin explotar ni {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}arder{/g}. La maestra de vocos informa de que el prisma del laboratorio del Hemónculo se fragmentó en una infinidad de agujas. Salió volando en todas direcciones con un fuerte chasquido, hiriendo gravemente a varios miembros de la tripulación.{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}{/g}

languages.text: Die Entfernung des Senders von der Plattform verläuft wie geplant. Nichts geschieht. Der gigantische stöhnende Teppich von Mutanten bleibt einfach liegen. Sie explodieren nicht und verbrennen nicht. Die Voxmeisterin berichtet, dass das Prisma aus dem Laboratorium des Haemonculus in tausend Nadeln zersprungen ist. Mit einem lauten Knall ist es explodiert und die Nadeln sind in alle Richtungen geflogen, wobei mehrere Crewmitglieder schwer verwundet wurden.
languages.original_text: The removal of the beacon from the platform proceeds as planned. Nothing happens afterward. The gigantic groaning carpet of mutants continues lying where they were — neither exploding nor burning up. The Vox Master reports that the prism from the Haemonculus's laboratory shattered into a myriad of needles. It flew apart in every direction with a loud snap, gravely wounding several crew members.

traits.locale_text: Die Entfernung des Senders von der Plattform verläuft wie geplant. Nichts geschieht. Der gigantische stöhnende Teppich von Mutanten bleibt einfach liegen. Sie explodieren nicht und verbrennen nicht. Die Voxmeisterin berichtet, dass das Prisma aus dem Laboratorium des Haemonculus in tausend Nadeln zersprungen ist. Mit einem lauten Knall ist es explodiert und die Nadeln sind in alle Richtungen geflogen, wobei mehrere Crewmitglieder schwer verwundet wurden.

languages.text: Le retrait de la balise se déroule comme prévu et rien ne se produit. La vaste tapisserie de mutants gémissants demeure intacte, et aucun n'explose ni ne brûle. En revanche, la maîtresse-vox vous informe que le prisme récupéré dans le laboratoire de l'hémoncule a éclaté en une myriade de petites aiguilles. Projetées dans toutes les directions avec un craquement assourdissant, elles ont grièvement blessé certains membres de l'équipage.
languages.original_text: The removal of the beacon from the platform proceeds as planned. Nothing happens afterward. The gigantic groaning carpet of mutants continues lying where they were — neither exploding nor burning up. The Vox Master reports that the prism from the Haemonculus's laboratory shattered into a myriad of needles. It flew apart in every direction with a loud snap, gravely wounding several crew members.

traits.locale_text: Le retrait de la balise se déroule comme prévu et rien ne se produit. La vaste tapisserie de mutants gémissants demeure intacte, et aucun n'explose ni ne brûle. En revanche, la maîtresse-vox vous informe que le prisme récupéré dans le laboratoire de l'hémoncule a éclaté en une myriade de petites aiguilles. Projetées dans toutes les directions avec un craquement assourdissant, elles ont grièvement blessé certains membres de l'équipage.

languages.text: Parıldağın platformdan sökülmesi, planlandığı gibi gidiyor ve sonrasında hiçbir şey olmuyor. Feryat eden mutantlardan oluşan geniş kümeler, hiçbiri yanmak veya patlamaksızın aynı şekilde kalmaya devam ediyor. Voks Üstadı, Haimonkulus'un laboratuvarından çıkarılan prizmanın sayısız küçük parçaya ayrıldığını bildiriyor. Sağır edici bir çatırtıyla her yöne fırlayan parçalar, bazı tayfaların ciddi şekilde yaralanmasına sebep oluyor.
languages.original_text: The removal of the beacon from the platform proceeds as planned. Nothing happens afterward. The gigantic groaning carpet of mutants continues lying where they were — neither exploding nor burning up. The Vox Master reports that the prism from the Haemonculus's laboratory shattered into a myriad of needles. It flew apart in every direction with a loud snap, gravely wounding several crew members.
